      find device with device type.
      Parameters:
      device_type - Device.PHONE_TYPE or Device.COMPUTER_TYPE
      Returns:
      list of matching devices

    • FindDeviceById

      Parameters:
      id - ID of the device to find
      Returns:
      requested device

    • FindDevice

      public List<Device> FindDevice​(int type, String brand)
      Find a device with its type and brand
      Parameters:
      type - Device.PHONE_TYPE or Device.COMPUTER_TYPE
      brand - Brand name
      Returns:
      list of matching devices

    • DeleteAll

      public void DeleteAll()
      delete all the devices in the repository. Used by tests.

    • SearchPhones

      public List<Phone> SearchPhones​(String brand, String model, String screensize, float minprice, float maxprice, int mininternalmemory, int maxinternalmemory)
      search phones for matching criterias
      Parameters:
      brand - optional brand name to check
      model - optional model name to check
      screensize - optional screen size to match
      minprice - minimum price for the dveice
      maxprice - maximum price for the device
      mininternalmemory - minimum memory for the device
      maxinternalmemory - maxiumum memory for the device
      Returns:
      list of all matching devices

    • SearchComputers

      public List<Computer> SearchComputers​(String brand, String model, String screenSize, float minprice, float maxprice, int minstoragecapacity, int maxstoragecapacity, String processor, String screenResolution, int minmemory, int maxmemory)
      /**
      Parameters:
      brand - Optional brand name to match.
      model - Optional device model
      screenSize - Optional screensize for the device.
      minprice - minimum price for the devices to find
      maxprice - maximum price for the devices to find
      minstoragecapacity - minimum hard disk space for devices to find
      maxstoragecapacity - maximum hard disk space for devices to find
      processor - Optional processor name
      screenResolution - Screem resolution, like 1920x1080
      minmemory - minimum memory for devices to find
      maxmemory - maximum memory for devices to find.
      Returns:
      List of all matching devices
